title: The reflexive and transitive properties of relations

blocks.name: coss12d
blocks.content: Subset deduction for composition of two classes. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm coss12d(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c3))
} = {
  3sstr4g(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c2, c3), copab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))), copab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))))), w0)
  ssopab2dv(hs0, hs2, w0, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2)))))
  eximdv(hs1, w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))))
  anim12d(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2)))
  ssbrd(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c3, w0)
  ssbrd(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2), c2, w0)
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c1)
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm coss12d(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∘ c1)⊆(c2 ∘ c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ c3)
} = {
  3sstr4g((c0 ∘ c1), (c2 ∘ c3), { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))}, { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c3]hs1 ∧ hs1[c2]hs2))}, w0)
  ssopab2dv(hs0, hs2, w0, ∃(hs1,(hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)), ∃(hs1,(hs0[c3]hs1 ∧ hs1[c2]hs2)))
  eximdv(hs1, w0, (hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2), (hs0[c3]hs1 ∧ hs1[c2]hs2))
  anim12d(w0, hs0[c1]hs1, hs1[c0]hs2, hs0[c3]hs1, hs1[c2]hs2)
  ssbrd(hs0, c1, hs1, c3, w0)
  ssbrd(hs1, c0, hs2, c2, w0)
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c1)
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: trrelssd
blocks.content: The composition of subclasses of a transitive relation is a subclass of that relation. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: xpcogend
blocks.content: The most interesting case of the composition of two cross products. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpcogend(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccom(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), cxp(c2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(cin(c3, c0), emptycls))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(ccom(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), cxp(c2, c1), copab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c3), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c1), cv(hs2))))), copab(hs0, hs2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))), w0)
  opabbidv(hs0, hs2, w0, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c3), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c1), cv(hs2)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)))
  syl6rbbr(w0, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c3), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c1), cv(hs2)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))))
  biantrud(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))))
  sylib(w0, wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))), wne(cin(c3, c0), emptycls))
  ndisj(hs1, c3, c0)
  3bitri(wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c3), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c1), cv(hs2)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))), wex(hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))), wex(hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))))
  exbii(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c3), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c1), cv(hs2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))))
  anbi12i(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c3), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c1), cv(hs2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  brxp(cv(hs0), c2, c3, cv(hs1))
  biancomi(wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c1), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  brxp(cv(hs1), c0, c1, cv(hs2))
  exbii(hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))))
  an4(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  19.42v(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3))
  df-xp(hs0, hs2, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.hs2.c(cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c2, c3))
  diff.hs2.c(cxp(c2, c3))
  diff.hs1.c(cxp(c2, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xpcogend(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 × c1)∘(c2 × c3))=(c2 × c1))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 ⋂ c0)≠ ∅)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(((c0 × c1)∘(c2 × c3)), (c2 × c1), { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[(c2 × c3)]hs1 ∧ hs1[(c0 × c1)]hs2))}, { < hs0, hs2 > |(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1)}, w0)
  opabbidv(hs0, hs2, w0, ∃(hs1,(hs0[(c2 × c3)]hs1 ∧ hs1[(c0 × c1)]hs2)), (hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1))
  syl6rbbr(w0, ∃(hs1,(hs0[(c2 × c3)]hs1 ∧ hs1[(c0 × c1)]hs2)), (hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1), ((hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1)∧ ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))))
  biantrud(w0, (hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1), ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)))
  sylib(w0, ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)), (c3 ⋂ c0)≠ ∅)
  ndisj(hs1, c3, c0)
  3bitri(∃(hs1,(hs0[(c2 × c3)]hs1 ∧ hs1[(c0 × c1)]hs2)), ((hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1)∧ ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))), ∃(hs1,((hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3)∧(hs2 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))), ∃(hs1,((hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1)∧(hs1 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))))
  exbii(hs1, (hs0[(c2 × c3)]hs1 ∧ hs1[(c0 × c1)]hs2), ((hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3)∧(hs2 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)))
  anbi12i(hs0[(c2 × c3)]hs1, hs1[(c0 × c1)]hs2, (hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3), (hs2 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))
  brxp(hs0, c2, c3, hs1)
  biancomi(hs1[(c0 × c1)]hs2, hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c0)
  brxp(hs1, c0, c1, hs2)
  exbii(hs1, ((hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3)∧(hs2 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)), ((hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1)∧(hs1 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)))
  an4(hs0 ∈ c2, hs1 ∈ c3, hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c0)
  19.42v(hs1, (hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1), (hs1 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, (c0 × c1), (c2 × c3))
  df-xp(hs0, hs2, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w((hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 × c1))
  diff.hs2.c((c0 × c1))
  diff.hs1.c((c0 × c1))
  diff.hs0.c((c2 × c3))
  diff.hs2.c((c2 × c3))
  diff.hs1.c((c2 × c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: xpcoidgend
blocks.content: If two classes are not disjoint, then the composition of their cross-product with itself is idempotent. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: cotr2g
blocks.content: Two ways of saying that the composition of two relations is included in a third relation. See its special instance ~ cotr2 for the main application. (Contributed by RP, 22-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm cotr2g(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wb(wss(ccom(c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wral(s2, c5, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))))
  -| wss(cdm(c1), c3)
  -| wss(cin(crn(c1), cdm(c0)), c4)
  -| wss(crn(c0), c5)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wss(ccom(c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wral(s2, c5, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wb(wss(ccom(c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wral(s2, c5, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))), diffsc(s1, c4))
  a1ii(wb(wss(ccom(c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wral(s2, c5, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))), diffsc(s2, c5))
  3bitri(wss(ccom(c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wral(s2, c5, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), c5), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))))
  cotrg(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
  bitri(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), c5), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))), wral(s0, c3, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c4), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c5), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))))))
  3bitr4i(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))), wral(s0, c3, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c4), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c5), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c4), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c5), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c4), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c5), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))))))
  albii(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c4), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c5), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c4), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c5), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))))))
  19.21-2(s1, s2, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c4), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c5), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))
  nfv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  nfv(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  2albii(s0, s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c4), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c5), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))))
  albii(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c4), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c5), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))))
  3bitri(wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c4), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c5), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))), wi(wa(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4), wcel(cv(s2), c5)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))), wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4), wcel(cv(s2), c5)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))
  imbi1i(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wa(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4), wcel(cv(s2), c5)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))
  3bitri(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wa(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4), wcel(cv(s2), c5)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))), w3a(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c4), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c5), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))
  impbii(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), w3a(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))

  df-ral(s0, c3, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c4), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c5), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))))

  19.21v(s2, wcel(cv(s1), c4), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c5), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))

  df-ral(s2, c5, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c3)

blocks.name: cotr2
blocks.content: Two ways of saying a relation is transitive. Special instance of ~ cotr2g . (Contributed by RP, 22-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm cotr2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))))))
  -| wss(cdm(c0), c1)
  -| wss(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), c2)
  -| wss(crn(c0), c3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  cotr2g(s0, s1, s2, c0, c0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  eqsstr3i(cin(crn(c0), cdm(c0)), c2, cin(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  incom(cdm(c0), crn(c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cotr2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈ c3,((s0[c0]s1 ∧ s1[c0]s2)→ s0[c0]s2)))))
  ⊣ dom(c0)⊆ c1
  ⊣ (dom(c0)⋂ ran(c0))⊆ c2
  ⊣ ran(c0)⊆ c3
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
} = {
  cotr2g(s0, s1, s2, c0, c0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  eqsstr3i((ran(c0)⋂ dom(c0)), c2, (dom(c0)⋂ ran(c0)))
  incom(dom(c0), ran(c0))
}

blocks.name: cotr3
blocks.content: Two ways of saying a relation is transitive. (Contributed by RP, 22-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm cotr3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cdm(c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cin(c1, c3))
  -| wceq(c3, crn(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  cotr2(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  eqimss2i(cdm(c0), c1)
  eqimss2i(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), c2)
  eqtri(c2, cin(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cin(c1, c3))
  ineq12i(c1, c3, cdm(c0), crn(c0))
  eqimss2i(crn(c0), c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cotr3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈ c3,((s0[c0]s1 ∧ s1[c0]s2)→ s0[c0]s2)))))
  ⊣ c1 = dom(c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(c1 ⋂ c3)
  ⊣ c3 = ran(c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
} = {
  cotr2(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  eqimss2i(dom(c0), c1)
  eqimss2i((dom(c0)⋂ ran(c0)), c2)
  eqtri(c2, (dom(c0)⋂ ran(c0)), (c1 ⋂ c3))
  ineq12i(c1, c3, dom(c0), ran(c0))
  eqimss2i(ran(c0), c3)
}

blocks.name: coemptyd
blocks.content: Deduction about composition of classes with no relational content in common. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: xptrrel
blocks.content: The cross product is always a transitive relation. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm xptrrel(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(ccom(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wss(ccom(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls))
  syl6eqss(ccom(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1), emptycls, wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls))
  coemptyd(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls))
  syl(wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdm(cxp(c0, c1)), crn(cxp(c0, c1))), emptycls), wss(cin(cdm(cxp(c0, c1)), crn(cxp(c0, c1))), emptycls))
  syl5ss(cin(cdm(cxp(c0, c1)), crn(cxp(c0, c1))), emptycls, cin(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls))
  ssini(cin(cdm(cxp(c0, c1)), crn(cxp(c0, c1))), c0, c1)
  sstri(cin(cdm(cxp(c0, c1)), crn(cxp(c0, c1))), c0, cdm(cxp(c0, c1)))
  inss1(cdm(cxp(c0, c1)), crn(cxp(c0, c1)))
  dmxpss(c0, c1)
  sstri(cin(cdm(cxp(c0, c1)), crn(cxp(c0, c1))), c1, crn(cxp(c0, c1)))
  inss2(cdm(cxp(c0, c1)), crn(cxp(c0, c1)))
  rnxpss(c0, c1)
  eqimss(cin(c0, c1), emptycls)
  ss0(cin(cdm(cxp(c0, c1)), crn(cxp(c0, c1))))
  0ss(cxp(c0, c1))
  syl6eqss(ccom(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c1), wn(wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls)))
  xpcoidgend(c0, c1, wn(wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls)))
  neqne(cin(c0, c1), emptycls)
  ssid(cxp(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xptrrel(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 × c1)∘(c0 × c1))⊆(c0 × c1)
} = {
  pm2.61i(((c0 × c1)∘(c0 × c1))⊆(c0 × c1), (c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅)
  syl6eqss(((c0 × c1)∘(c0 × c1)), (c0 × c1), emptycls, (c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅)
  coemptyd((c0 × c1), (c0 × c1), (c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅)
  syl((c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅, (dom((c0 × c1))⋂ ran((c0 × c1)))= ∅, (dom((c0 × c1))⋂ ran((c0 × c1)))⊆ ∅)
  syl5ss((dom((c0 × c1))⋂ ran((c0 × c1))), emptycls, (c0 ⋂ c1), (c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅)
  ssini((dom((c0 × c1))⋂ ran((c0 × c1))), c0, c1)
  sstri((dom((c0 × c1))⋂ ran((c0 × c1))), c0, dom((c0 × c1)))
  inss1(dom((c0 × c1)), ran((c0 × c1)))
  dmxpss(c0, c1)
  sstri((dom((c0 × c1))⋂ ran((c0 × c1))), c1, ran((c0 × c1)))
  inss2(dom((c0 × c1)), ran((c0 × c1)))
  rnxpss(c0, c1)
  eqimss((c0 ⋂ c1), emptycls)
  ss0((dom((c0 × c1))⋂ ran((c0 × c1))))
  0ss((c0 × c1))
  syl6eqss(((c0 × c1)∘(c0 × c1)), (c0 × c1), (c0 × c1), ¬(c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅)
  xpcoidgend(c0, c1, ¬(c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅)
  neqne((c0 ⋂ c1), emptycls)
  ssid((c0 × c1))
}

blocks.name: 0trrel
blocks.content: The empty class is a transitive relation. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.)
